just so.;;now, let's make a cube, shall we?
cubes need a top, a left and a right.;;0.0;;0.0

3 of a kind.;;pieces can have 'qualities.'
'color' is just such a quality. red in this case.;;0.0;;0.0

3 all unique.;;you can also form a cube when a quality
is all-different.
3 different colors means 3 points.;;0.0;;0.0

pattern recognition.;;color isn't the only quality.
pay attention to pattern, too.;;0.0;;0.0

compound interest.;;just because one quality is all-same
doesn't mean the other has to be.
try color and pattern together!;;0.0;;0.0

hit me.;;if you can't find a match press 
the + button in the upper right corner!
you'll get up to 3 more pieces.;;0.0;;0.0

brilliant.;;now you know everything there is to know
about how to play Crystallon.;;0.0;;0.0
